result.eng: We will be swimming in the sea this summer.

result.eng: I live right beside the sea.

result.eng: I go swimming in the sea ever day of the year. Even in the winter?

result.eng: The black rain clouds made the sea look gloomy and dark.

result.eng: I'll tell my father on him as soon as he comes from the sea.

result.eng: They would often sit, the two of them, on the bank of the sea.
